metadata.description: Generate video with audio from audio, text and images using LTX-2 Distilled and custom LoRA

info.title: Queue OpenAPI for fal-ai/ltx-2-19b/distilled/audio-to-video/lora
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the fal-ai/ltx-2-19b/distilled/audio-to-video/lora queue.

match_audio_length.title: Match Audio Length
match_audio_length.description: When enabled, the number of frames will be calculated based on the audio duration and FPS. When disabled, use the specified num_frames.

use_multiscale.title: Use Multi-Scale
use_multiscale.description: Whether to use multi-scale generation. If True, the model will generate the video at a smaller scale first, then use the smaller video to guide the generation of a video at or above your requested size. This results in better coherence and details.

examples: A woman speaks to the camera
prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: The prompt to generate the video from.

fps.title: FPS
fps.description: The frames per second of the generated video.

loras.title: LoRAs
loras.description: The LoRAs to use for the generation.

camera_lora.title: Camera LoRA
camera_lora.description: The camera LoRA to use. This allows you to control the camera movement of the generated video more accurately than just prompting the model to move the camera.

video_size.description: The size of the generated video. Use 'auto' to match the input image dimensions if provided.
video_size.title: Video Size

enable_safety_checker.title: Enable Safety Checker
enable_safety_checker.description: Whether to enable the safety checker.

num_frames.description: The number of frames to generate.
num_frames.title: Number of Frames

image_strength.title: Image Strength
image_strength.description: The strength of the image to use for the video generation.

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: The negative prompt to generate the video from.
negative_prompt.default: blurry, out of focus, overexposed, underexposed, low contrast, washed out colors, excessive noise, grainy texture, poor lighting, flickering, motion blur, distorted proportions, unnatural skin tones, deformed facial features, asymmetrical face, missing facial features, extra limbs, disfigured hands, wrong hand count, artifacts around text, inconsistent perspective, camera shake, incorrect depth of field, background too sharp, background clutter, distracting reflections, harsh shadows, inconsistent lighting direction, color banding, cartoonish rendering, 3D CGI look, unrealistic materials, uncanny valley effect, incorrect ethnicity, wrong gender, exaggerated expressions, wrong gaze direction, mismatched lip sync, silent or muted audio, distorted voice, robotic voice, echo, background noise, off-sync audio,incorrect dialogue, added dialogue, repetitive speech, jittery movement, awkward pauses, incorrect timing, unnatural transitions, inconsistent framing, tilted camera, flat lighting, inconsistent tone, cinematic oversaturation, stylized filters, or AI artifacts.

camera_lora_scale.title: Camera LoRA Scale
camera_lora_scale.description: The scale of the camera LoRA to use. This allows you to control the camera movement of the generated video more accurately than just prompting the model to move the camera.

video_write_mode.title: Video Write Mode
video_write_mode.description: The write mode of the generated video.

video_output_type.title: Video Output Type
video_output_type.description: The output type of the generated video.

preprocess_audio.title: Preprocess Audio
preprocess_audio.description: Whether to preprocess the audio before using it as conditioning.

image_url.description: Optional URL of an image to use as the first frame of the video.
image_url.title: Image URL

video_quality.title: Video Quality
video_quality.description: The quality of the generated video.

sync_mode.title: Sync Mode
sync_mode.description: If `True`, the media will be returned as a data URI and the output data won't be available in the request history.

audio_url.title: Audio URL
audio_url.description: The URL of the audio to generate the video from.

audio_strength.title: Audio Strength
audio_strength.description: Audio conditioning strength. Values below 1.0 will allow the model to change the audio, while a value of exactly 1.0 will use the input audio without modification.

seed.description: The seed for the random number generator.
seed.title: Seed

examples: A woman speaks to the camera
prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: The prompt used for the generation.

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: The seed used for the random number generator.

path.title: Path
path.description: URL, HuggingFace repo ID (owner/repo) to lora weights.

scale.title: Scale
scale.description: Scale factor for LoRA application (0.0 to 4.0).

weight_name.description: Name of the LoRA weight. Only used if `path` is a HuggingFace repository, and is only required when the repository contains multiple LoRA weights.
weight_name.title: Weight Name

height.title: Height
height.description: The height of the generated image.

width.title: Width
width.description: The width of the generated image.

file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.
file_size.title: File Size

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.

file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.
file_name.title: File Name

content_type.description: The mime type of the file.
content_type.title: Content Type

num_frames.description: The number of frames in the video
num_frames.title: Num Frames

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.

metadata.description: Generate dubbed videos or audios using ElevenLabs Dubbing feature!

info.title: Queue OpenAPI for fal-ai/elevenlabs/dubbing
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the fal-ai/elevenlabs/dubbing queue.

video_url.description: URL of the video file to dub. Either audio_url or video_url must be provided. If both are provided, video_url takes priority.
video_url.title: Video Url

audio_url.description: URL of the audio file to dub. Either audio_url or video_url must be provided.
audio_url.title: Audio Url

highest_resolution.description: Whether to use the highest resolution for dubbing.
highest_resolution.title: Highest Resolution

source_lang.description: Source language code. If not provided, will be auto-detected.
source_lang.title: Source Lang

num_speakers.description: Number of speakers in the audio. If not provided, will be auto-detected.
num_speakers.title: Num Speakers

target_lang.description: The target language of the dubbed content
target_lang.title: Target Lang

video.description: The dubbed video file. Will be populated if video_url was provided in the request.

file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.
file_size.title: File Size

file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.
file_name.title: File Name

content_type.description: The mime type of the file.
content_type.title: Content Type

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
url.title: Url

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.

metadata.description: LongCat-Video-Avatar is an audio-driven video generation model that can generates super-realistic, lip-synchronized long video generation with natural dynamics and consistent identity.

info.title: Queue OpenAPI for fal-ai/longcat-multi-avatar/image-audio-to-video
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the fal-ai/longcat-multi-avatar/image-audio-to-video queue.

examples: Static camera, In a professional recording studio, two people stand facing each other, both wearing large headphones. They are speaking clearly into a large condenser microphone suspended between them. They looked at each other affectionately and occasionally shook their heads according to the rhythm. The soundproofed walls and visible recording equipment create an atmosphere focused on capturing high-quality audio as they interact and communicate.
prompt.description: The prompt to guide the video generation.
prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.default: Two people are having a conversation with natural expressions and movements.

num_inference_steps.description: The number of inference steps to use.
num_inference_steps.title: Number of Inference Steps

audio_url_person2.description: The URL of the audio file for person 2 (right side).
audio_url_person2.title: Audio URL Person 2

bbox_person1.description: Bounding box for person 1. If not provided, defaults to left half of image.
bbox_person1.title: Bbox Person1

negative_prompt.description: The negative prompt to avoid in the video generation.
negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.default: Close-up, Bright tones, overexposed, static, blurred details, subtitles, style, works, paintings, images, static, overall gray, worst quality, low quality, JPEG compression residue, ugly, incomplete, extra fingers, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn faces, deformed, disfigured, misshapen limbs, fused fingers, still picture, messy background, three legs, many people in the background, walking backwards

text_guidance_scale.description: The text guidance scale for classifier-free guidance.
text_guidance_scale.title: Text Guidance Scale

resolution.description: Resolution of the generated video (480p or 720p). Billing is per video-second (16 frames): 480p is 1 unit per second and 720p is 4 units per second.
resolution.title: Resolution

audio_type.description: How to combine the two audio tracks. 'para' (parallel) plays both simultaneously, 'add' (sequential) plays person 1 first then person 2.
audio_type.title: Audio Type

image_url.description: The URL of the image containing two speakers.
image_url.title: Image URL

audio_url_person1.description: The URL of the audio file for person 1 (left side).
audio_url_person1.title: Audio URL Person 1

seed.description: The seed for the random number generator.
seed.title: Seed

audio_guidance_scale.description: The audio guidance scale. Higher values may lead to exaggerated mouth movements.
audio_guidance_scale.title: Audio Guidance Scale

bbox_person2.description: Bounding box for person 2. If not provided, defaults to right half of image.
bbox_person2.title: Bbox Person2

num_segments.description: Number of video segments to generate. Each segment adds ~5 seconds of video. First segment is ~5.8s, additional segments are 5s each.
num_segments.title: Number of Segments

LongcatMultiAvatarImageAudioToVideoInput.description: Request model for multi-speaker image+audio to video generation.
LongcatMultiAvatarImageAudioToVideoInput.title: MultiSpeakerImageAudioToVideoRequest

LongcatMultiAvatarImageAudioToVideoOutpu.description: Response model for multi-speaker image+audio to video generation.
LongcatMultiAvatarImageAudioToVideoOutpu.title: MultiSpeakerImageAudioToVideoResponse

file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.
file_size.title: File Size

file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.
file_name.title: File Name

content_type.description: The mime type of the file.
content_type.title: Content Type

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
url.title: Url

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.

metadata.description: LongCat-Video-Avatar is an audio-driven video generation model that can generates super-realistic, lip-synchronized long video generation with natural dynamics and consistent identity.

info.title: Queue OpenAPI for fal-ai/longcat-single-avatar/audio-to-video
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the fal-ai/longcat-single-avatar/audio-to-video queue.

examples: A person is talking naturally with natural expressions and movements.
prompt.description: The prompt to guide the video generation.
prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.default: A person is talking naturally with natural expressions and movements.

resolution.description: Resolution of the generated video (480p or 720p). Billing is per video-second (16 frames): 480p is 1 unit per second and 720p is 4 units per second.
resolution.title: Resolution

audio_guidance_scale.description: The audio guidance scale. Higher values may lead to exaggerated mouth movements.
audio_guidance_scale.title: Audio Guidance Scale

num_segments.description: Number of video segments to generate. Each segment adds ~5 seconds of video. First segment is ~5.8s, additional segments are 5s each.
num_segments.title: Number of Segments

audio_url.description: The URL of the audio file to drive the avatar.
audio_url.title: Audio URL

num_inference_steps.description: The number of inference steps to use.
num_inference_steps.title: Number of Inference Steps

seed.description: The seed for the random number generator.
seed.title: Seed

negative_prompt.description: The negative prompt to avoid in the video generation.
negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.default: Close-up, Bright tones, overexposed, static, blurred details, subtitles, style, works, paintings, images, static, overall gray, worst quality, low quality, JPEG compression residue, ugly, incomplete, extra fingers, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn faces, deformed, disfigured, misshapen limbs, fused fingers, still picture, messy background, three legs, many people in the background, walking backwards

text_guidance_scale.description: The text guidance scale for classifier-free guidance.
text_guidance_scale.title: Text Guidance Scale

LongcatSingleAvatarAudioToVideoOutput.description: Response model for audio-to-video generation (no reference image).
LongcatSingleAvatarAudioToVideoOutput.title: AudioToVideoResponse

file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.
file_size.title: File Size

file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.
file_name.title: File Name

content_type.description: The mime type of the file.
content_type.title: Content Type

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
url.title: Url

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.

metadata.description: High-quality avatar videos that feel real, generated from your audio

info.title: Queue OpenAPI for argil/avatars/audio-to-video
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the argil/avatars/audio-to-video queue.

remove_background.title: Remove Background
remove_background.description: Enabling the remove background feature will result in a 50% increase in the price.

file_size.title: File Size
file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

file_name.title: File Name
file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: The mime type of the file.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.

metadata.description: Wan-S2V is a video model that generates high-quality videos from static images and audio, with realistic facial expressions, body movements, and professional camera work for film and television applications

info.title: Queue OpenAPI for fal-ai/wan/v2.2-14b/speech-to-video
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the fal-ai/wan/v2.2-14b/speech-to-video queue.

examples: Summer beach vacation style, a white cat wearing sunglasses sits on a surfboard.
prompt.description: The text prompt used for video generation.
prompt.title: Prompt

shift.description: Shift value for the video. Must be between 1.0 and 10.0.
shift.title: Shift

frames_per_second.description: Frames per second of the generated video. Must be between 4 to 60. When using interpolation and `adjust_fps_for_interpolation` is set to true (default true,) the final FPS will be multiplied by the number of interpolated frames plus one. For example, if the generated frames per second is 16 and the number of interpolated frames is 1, the final frames per second will be 32. If `adjust_fps_for_interpolation` is set to false, this value will be used as-is.
frames_per_second.title: Frames per Second

guidance_scale.description: Classifier-free guidance scale. Higher values give better adherence to the prompt but may decrease quality.
guidance_scale.title: Guidance Scale

num_frames.description: Number of frames to generate. Must be between 40 to 120, (must be multiple of 4).
num_frames.title: Number of Frames

enable_safety_checker.description: If set to true, input data will be checked for safety before processing.
enable_safety_checker.title: Enable Safety Checker

video_write_mode.description: The write mode of the output video. Faster write mode means faster results but larger file size, balanced write mode is a good compromise between speed and quality, and small write mode is the slowest but produces the smallest file size.
video_write_mode.title: Video Write Mode

resolution.description: Resolution of the generated video (480p, 580p, or 720p).
resolution.title: Resolution

enable_output_safety_checker.description: If set to true, output video will be checked for safety after generation.
enable_output_safety_checker.title: Enable Output Safety Checker

image_url.description: URL of the input image. If the input image does not match the chosen aspect ratio, it is resized and center cropped.
image_url.title: Image URL

video_quality.description: The quality of the output video. Higher quality means better visual quality but larger file size.
video_quality.title: Video Quality

audio_url.description: The URL of the audio file.
audio_url.title: Audio URL

num_inference_steps.description: Number of inference steps for sampling. Higher values give better quality but take longer.
num_inference_steps.title: Number of Inference Steps

seed.description: Random seed for reproducibility. If None, a random seed is chosen.
seed.title: Seed

file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.
file_size.title: File Size

file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.
file_name.title: File Name

content_type.description: The mime type of the file.
content_type.title: Content Type

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
url.title: Url

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.

metadata.description: Stable Avatar generates audio-driven video avatars up to five minutes long

info.title: Queue OpenAPI for fal-ai/stable-avatar
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the fal-ai/stable-avatar queue.

examples: A person is in a relaxed pose. As the video progresses, the character speaks while arm and body movements are minimal and consistent with a natural speaking posture. Hand movements remain minimal. Don't blink too often. Preserve background integrity matching the reference image's spatial configuration, lighting conditions, and color temperature.
prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: The prompt to use for the video generation.

aspect_ratio.title: Aspect Ratio
aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio of the video to generate. If 'auto', the aspect ratio will be determined by the reference image.

perturbation.title: Perturbation
perturbation.description: The amount of perturbation to use for the video generation. 0.0 means no perturbation, 1.0 means full perturbation.

image_url.title: Image URL
image_url.description: The URL of the image to use as a reference for the video generation.

guidance_scale.title: Guidance Scale
guidance_scale.description: The guidance scale to use for the video generation.

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: The seed to use for the video generation.

num_inference_steps.title: Number of Inference Steps
num_inference_steps.description: The number of inference steps to use for the video generation.

audio_url.title: Audio URL
audio_url.description: The URL of the audio to use as a reference for the video generation.

audio_guidance_scale.title: Audio Guidance Scale
audio_guidance_scale.description: The audio guidance scale to use for the video generation.

file_size.title: File Size
file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

file_name.title: File Name
file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: The mime type of the file.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.
